description:
Integrate your web app with Discord services

Supplies Discord login service plus the ability to send chat messages to text channels using the discord webhook feature
name: Discord - Fixed Some Major Issues
plugin_instructions: go to https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me and create your App and credentials. Add them to the plugin settings and then use the login/signup action in a workflow to log in via discord. Can also use the "Get Users" API call to save user info to Bubble.
